text: stop your waffling guys it's time to

you want to whisk together some flour

and two tablespoons of sugar and add a

so I'm gonna use 1/2 teaspoon for the
wet ingredients I have two large eggs
then whisk in one cup of milk and four
tablespoons of melted butter unsalted
please then those get combined I mean
honestly this is so easy why are you

that's it waffle batter is done it's
basically like pancake batter now when

each standard waffle is about a half a
